response.answer_text: if I really love the motions of the songs I read the lyrics a few times and play it over and over again. I learned all the words to YES albums and Emerson Lake and Palmer….like PIRATES….I can recite the whole thing with or without music. I can phonetically memorize songs in other languages like some Barbara Streisand songs. It just happens quickly and once they are there I remember even if haven’t heard them in years. Don’t know how but there are a shit load of complete songs in my head.

Oh, I don’t remember them all the time. I screw them up quite often. :P Well, I think listening to a song(carefully) again and again might help you remembering the lyrics. If not, try listening to the song and reading it’s lyrics at the same time. That might help as well.
